Class Authority

java.lang.Object
net.ovonsame.modding.Authority
public final class Authority extends Object
Class Authority contains private wrapper classes for each supported integration platform which implements the Author interface
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getAuthor

      public static Author getAuthor(Platform platform, String identifier, @Nullable @Nullable String key) throws IOException
      With this method you can get authors registered on a platform.
      Parameters:
      platform - Platform to get author from
      identifier - Identifier of the author
      key - Optional key which is required for some platforms
      Returns:
      Author from the specified platform with the specified identifier
      Throws:
      IOException - If the author is not found, key is not provided or is invalid and the platform requires it, if some errors occurs while connecting with the platform
      See Also:
      • Author
      • Platform.Wrapper
      • Platform
